articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Miami F1 struggles feel like a "kick in the gut" – Hamilton - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says Mercedes’ slump in second practice for Formula 1’s Miami Grand Prix felt like a "kick in the gut" after the promise shown in the first session.
articles.content: The seven-time world champion had been right behind Mercedes team-mate George Russell as they topped the timesheets in FP1, but his form fell away in the evening practice session as Hamilton ended up… [+1977 chars]
